subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks won their first playoff game in 11 years and trimmed the Heat’s series lead to 3-1 as Carmelo Anthony and Amar’e Stoudemire combined for 61 points.
snippet: The Knicks won their first playoff game in 11 years and trimmed the Heat’s series lead to 3-1 as Carmelo Anthony and Amar’e Stoudemire combined for 61 points.
